articles.title: Congratulations to Minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Sierra Leone
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Sierra Leone
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, on Thursday sent a congratulatory  message to Samoura Camara on his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of the Republic of Sierra Leone.
					Pak in the message wished the minister success in his new job for developing the country's foreign relations, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Inspects Construction Site of Munsu Wading Pool
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Makes Field Survey of Construction of Munsu Wading Pool
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, made field survey of the construction of the Munsu Wading Pool in Pyongyang to be built by the KPA.
					He encouraged soldier-builders who are making innovations in the construction of the wading pool true to the behest of leader Kim Jong Il and the order of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Visiting various places of the construction site, he stressed that it is the mission of the army of the party and the revolutionary army to implement the order of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un to the letter.
					
					He acquainted himself in detail with issues arising in the construction and took measures.
					
					He told commanding officers to take good care of their living.
					
					He called on all soldier-builders to give full play to the spirit and stamina of the revolutionary army in the project to bring Kim Jong Un's love for the people into full bloom.

articles.title: Int'l Figure-skating Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
Int'l Figure Skating Festival to Be Held in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The 22nd Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival is to be held here from February 15 to 17 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					The festival is an annual event reflecting the unanimous desire and aspiration of the Korean people, world progressives and athletes to celebrate the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il as the greatest holiday of the nation and holiday common to humankind.
					
					The festival will bring together foreign and Korean skaters who proved successful in international and national contests. It will involve exhibition ice dances and pair and individual events.
					
					The festival will decorate the Day of the Shining Star in a peculiar manner.

articles.title: National Cooking Competition Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
National Cooking Competition Held in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A national cooking competition took place at the Ryugyong Rungna Restaurant here under the sponsorship of the Korean Association of Cooks on February 6-8.
					In this regard, KCNA had an interview with Secretary Jo Hi Guk and Department Director Kim Yong Il of the Association.
					
					Question: The national cooking competition has been held as an annual event in the country. Would you like to tell me about it?
					
					Answer (Jo): The competition is aimed to put the cookery on a scientific and aesthetic basis and ensure exchange of experiences and achievements gained in cooking.
					
					The current competition, divided into groups of public service, hotels and provincial public catering and service, was attended by cooks from 32 bodies.
					
					The competition was rated by professional and public assessment of choice of dishes, cooking processes and tastes.
					
					Q: Can you tell me about distinction between the current competition and the previous ones?
					
					A (Kim): The previous ones involved a wave of kinds of dishes. But, this competition mainly featured traditional dishes, including loach soup, roast, fruit punch and steamed fish.
					
					Dishes made by cooks from Okryu Restaurant, Chongryu Restaurant, Pyongyang Koryo Hotel and other units won high appreciation, as they lively represented the traditional and present-day aesthetic natures.
					
					The Association is set to upgrade the local cookeries by organizing diverse forms of courses, competitions and exhibitions, as part of efforts to build a civilized socialist nation.

articles.title: New Year's Greeting, Traditional Custom of Koreans
articles.content:
New Year's Greeting, Traditional Custom of Koreans
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The lunar New Year's Day falls on February 10 this year.
					From olden times, Koreans have spent the day significantly with their celebration beginning with the New Year's greetings to the senior.
					
					Yu Un Gyong, a lecturer of the Pyongyang Folklore Park, told KCNA:
					
					It is a custom of the Koreans to make bows to the senior when the lunar New Year's day dawns.
					
					New Year's greetings are offered to family members in order of age and then to old villagers, teachers and friends.
					
					Old people would give simple gifts they prepared to children when they make bows, while the grown-ups making a New Year's call are entertained with special dishes.
					
					Greetings are also offered to elders living in distant areas.
					
					Friends exchange well-wishing greetings, expressing the hope that everything would go well in the new year.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Senseless Remarks Ridiculed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Senseless Remarks Ridiculed
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea recently made such remarks that "the north is an unpredictable organization", groundlessly accusing the DPRK.
					No sooner had this been known to the public than people from all walks of life in south Korea bitterly censured and ridiculed him. They said "this is not the word to be uttered by the president" and "he is so imbecile that he is unable to distinguish a country from an organization".
					
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					What Lee uttered was by no means an accidental outpouring but it betrayed the black-hearted intent he has always harbored towards the north. So, such rigmarole can be let loose only by the traitor dead-set against reunification and keen on confrontation.
					
					Such deriding word as calling the DPRK an organization was mouthed only by fascist gangsters of the Intelligence Service, prosecution and "courts", but such word has never been heard from "presidents" before. It is only Lee who used such word in an official event as part of his malignant mud-slinging at the DPRK.
					
					This clearly indicates what bitterness and repugnance Lee has towards the DPRK.
					
					These confrontation-minded elements will only bring disasters to the Korean nation.
					
					The DPRK will mercilessly wipe out those who dare impair its dignity, failing to know who their rival is.
					
					There is no room for such worst traitors as Lee to stay in.
					
					They will be cursed and condemned by history down through generations even after their deaths.

articles.title: Japan's Ambition to Grab Tok Islets Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Ambition to Grab Tok Islets Slammed
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Homogeneous Nation Movement Organizations in south Korea held a press conference outside Japan's embassy in Seoul on Feb. 7 in protest against its ambition to grab Tok Islets, according to the south Korean Broadcasting Service.
					At the press conference speakers denounced the Japanese government for deciding to establish a new department which looks after the issue of Tok Islets.
					
					This is a wanton violation of the idea of peace and international order and clear evidence that Japan is dreaming of the revival of militarism, they held.

articles.title: Japanese Conservative Regime's National Discrimination Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's National Discrimination Slammed
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The principal and students of Korean Middle and High School in Tokyo held a press conference in Tokyo on Feb. 7 accusing the Japanese conservative government of excluding the Korean schools from the tuition-waiver program for senior high schools.
					At the press conference speakers accused the Japanese government of having excluded the Korean schools from the tuition-waiver program for senior high schools since it took office, asserting that "it is hard to get understanding from the people."
					
					This is an undisguised national discrimination and an intolerable illegal action, they held, adding:
					
					We will carry on their actions in protest against the Japanese authorities' attitude of trampling down the due rights of the Korean students in Japan.
					
					We will file a lawsuit in the Tokyo District Court in demand of compensation from the Japanese government.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK "Resolution" Will Only Lead to War: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK "Resolution" Will Only Lead to War: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The north-south relations remain extremely strained and a grave situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula. This is attributable to the unprecedented anti-DPRK actions of the U.S. and its allies which fabricated the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions," taking issue with the DPRK's legitimate satellite launch for peaceful purposes. 
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a bylined article. 
					
					It goes on:
					
					The Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea obsessed with extreme repugnance towards fellow countrymen is set to implement the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK in real earnest. It is frantically staging saber-rattling in collusion with the U.S., pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme pitch of tension. 
					
					Its racket for "sanctions" against the DPRK is a brigandish, hostile act to infringe upon the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					The "sanctions" will lead to a war. It is needless to say that the anti-DPRK "sanctions" row of the U.S. and its allies is nothing but a means for invading the DPRK. 
					
					It is nobody's secret that the U.S. aggression of anti-U.S. independent countries starts from "UN sanctions" and "independent sanctions" and they will lead to military attack. The U.S. is about to apply the same order of invasion against the DPRK. 
					
					The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces seek a prompt adoption of a resolution on "additional sanctions" in case of "the north's additional provocation" and try to invoke Article 42 of Chapter 7 of the UN Charter which calls for military "sanctions". 
					
					The above-said anti-DPRK "sanctions" racket is reaching a very dangerous phase. It is as clear as noonday that if it is overlooked, a nuclear war for invading the DPRK will break about on the Korean Peninsula in the end. 
					
					The DPRK is fully ready to cope with the economic and military "sanctions" by the U.S. and its allies. Those who hurt the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK even a bit will never be able to escape merciless retaliatory blows.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea "Status of Forces Agreement" Termed Shackling One
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea "Status of Forces Agreement" Termed Shackling One
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The U.S.-south Korea "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA) was concluded on July 9, 1966. Since it was put into force on February 9 the next year, it has legalized the crimes committed by the GIs who were put above the law of south Korea.
					South Korea can not punish GIs' crimes when they assert that they were on duty and, on the contrary, they can be ruled guiltless. So, GIs, who ran an armored car over middle schoolgirls Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son, who were passing by, to death, on June 13, 2002 were delivered the verdict of not-guilty under this agreement.
					
					Many south Koreans were ruthlessly killed or wounded in Maehyang-ri and other places due to the U.S. imperialist aggression forces' war maneuvers against the DPRK but south Korea has not yet wrested an apology from them, to say nothing of compensation.
					
					GIs killed Yun Kum I, Ho Ju Yon, Jon Ji Na, Ri Ki Sun and many other south Korean women but the murderers are stalking the world, evading capital punishment.
					
					During Lee Myung Bak's rule, GIs committed all sorts of crimes in all parts of south Korea as they were granted privileges by the SOFA.
					
					Drunken GIs wielded knives against south Korean residents and knocked down innocent people with a stick in Kyonggi Province. GIs also used violence against an old couple in their 70s and robbed them of a cell phone. There are a number of such crimes as arson, drug-related crimes, sexual assaults against women and extortion.
					
					GIs in the U.S. air force base in Osan found fault with south Koreans several times for no reason and committed assaults against them after handcuffing them. But the Lee group of traitors defended the GI criminals regardless of whether they were on their duty or not.
					
					From 2010 till late August last year, robbery, theft, violence, rape and other violent crimes and drug-related crimes committed by GIs numbered more than 300. But police handled those cases without physical restraint except one case. This clearly proved the submissive nature of the puppet group.
					
					All facts prove that as long as the U.S. imperialists remain in south Korea and the group of such sycophantic traitors as Lee holds the post of power, such tragic situation, in which the crimes committed by the occupation forces are painted as legal, will continue.

articles.title: Lee Regime's Crimes against Nation and Reunification Revealed
articles.content:
Lee Regime's Crimes against Nation and Reunification Revealed
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute Saturday released a document revealing 10 crimes committed by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors against the nation and reunification. The Lee regime plunged the north-south ties into a deadlock by escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen and the moves for a war against the DPRK.
					The document cited facts to prove that the group committed the crime of slandering the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, the crime of violating the north-south joint declarations, the crime of kicking up nuke and missile rackets against the DPRK, the crime of kicking up a human rights campaign against the DPRK, the crime of escalating confrontation between social systems against reunification, the crime of disrupting north-south dialogue, the crime of hindering cooperation and exchanges, the crime of suppressing the reunification movement, the crime of committing the moves for a war against the DPRK and the sycophantic and traitorous crime.
					
					According to it, the Lee Myung Bak group committed the hideous crime of slandering and insulting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, greatly enraging its army and people.
					
					When the nation suffered from a big loss, the regime seriously mocked at the Koreans who shed bitter tears, stricken with big grief, and prevented in every way south Koreans and other fellow countrymen from holding memorial services and paying condolatory visits to the DPRK.
					
					The regime did not hesitate to fire bullets into the target portraying the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and went so impudent as to set up slogans and literature insulting it.
					
					It totally denied the north-south declarations by labeling them as "pro-communist documents benefiting the enemy". It worked hard to prevent them from being implemented.
					
					It brought to naught all the achievements made in the June 15 era of reunification while describing it as a "lost decade". It cracked down on those who supported the north-south declarations and pushed former two "presidents" who signed them into deaths.
					
					During its office the Lee regime caused the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula, actively defended and followed the U.S. master who went reckless in the moves for a nuclear war against the DPRK and viciously kicked up nuclear and missile rackets against it.
					
					The regime has gone reckless, citing "additional provocation", "stronger sanctions" and "international cooperation" in reaction to the tough measures taken by the DPRK against the unreasonable UN "resolution on sanctions" that wantonly violated its dignity and sovereignty.
					
					The Lee regime worked hard to enact a "law on human rights in the north" at the puppet National Assembly. It even published the "north human rights white paper" and took riff-raffs to several countries to internationalize the "north's human rights issue".
					
					It has gone desperate in its moves to lure and abduct DPRK citizens and commit terror, destruction and subversion in the DPRK.
					
					The ill-famed case of the "association for bringing down statues" proves what an extent the Lee regime has gone in its smear campaign against the DPRK.
					
					The Lee regime openly talked about the "unification under liberal democracy" and set it as the general objective of its "north policy".
					
					Pursuant to this, the regime openly disclosed its ambition for confrontation between social systems while talking about "change" and "opening" whenever an opportunity presented itself. It also blatantly challenged the social system in the DPRK while making such rhetoric that "the south can not live with the north in the bright world", "the north should not be regarded as fellow countrymen with whom the south can live together" and "the north's regime should be dealt with, being separated from its citizens."
					
					During the traitor's five years in office, there has never been a dialogue between the authorities of the north and the south. Only confrontation escalated instead.
					
					The Lee regime checked the north-south cooperation and exchanges while touting that "economic cooperation is impossible as there is a nuke" and "cooperation will not help improve the south-north relations". It persistently hampered cooperation and exchanges with south Korean enterprises and NGOs while talking about "transparency", etc. 
					
					The Lee conservative regime invoked a fascist evil law and harshly suppressed pro-reunification movement organizations and figures, branding them as "forces following the north", "pro-communist elements" and "spies".
					
					Due to the regime's fascist suppression of the pro-reunification movement organizations, south Korea has turned into a land reminding one of the dark age under the "yusin" dictatorship when people were arrested at random for uttering even the word "unification".
					
					During Lee's office, Key Resolve, Foal Eagle, Ulji Freedom Guardian and other joint military exercises between the U.S. and the puppet forces were held more than 180 times. South Korean puppet forces staged thousand and hundreds of exercises.
					
					No sooner had it taken office than the Lee regime cried out for the "theory of prioritizing the relations" with the U.S., while harshly insulting the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					The traitor connived at the past crimes of Japan and fanned up its moves to become a military giant as well as its ambition for reinvasion and territorial expansion.
					
					The Lee regime is making last-ditch efforts to make sure that its traitorous and anti-reunification confrontation policy is carried forward to the next regime.
					
					The document said that the successive anti-reunification and confrontation maniacs all met miserable ends, warning that the Lee group will meet the more disgraceful fate for its thrice-cursed crimes against the nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Threatening Peace
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Threatening Peace
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the preparatory committee for the Taejon Strength of People of south Korea held a press conference before the Taejon City Office on Feb. 5 at which they denounced the "government" authorities for threatening peace.
					At the press conference speakers accused the present regime of increasing the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula in league with foreign forces after the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against the north was cooked up.
					
					They blasted the Lee Myung Bak regime for having torpedoed the south-north dialogue and pursued a hostile policy toward fellow countrymen for the five years of its office.
					
					The authorities' reckless remarks calling for not ruling out a war and mounting a preemptive attack amount to dangerous and bellicose acts to bring the nation to ruin, they charged.
					
					They urged the authorities to stop at once the acts of wrecking peace.

articles.title: S. Korean Court Sentences Pro-Reunification Patriot to Jail Terms
articles.content:
S. Korean Court Sentences Pro-Reunification Patriot to Jail Terms
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Central District Court of south Korea sentenced Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Korea's Reunification, to four years in prison and four years' suspension of qualifications and its general secretary to three years in prison and three years' suspension of qualifications on charges of violation of the draconian "Security Law".
					These legal actions were taken against Ro on the charge that he visited the north without the "government" permission, "benefiting the enemy" and against the secretary general on the charge that he helped the former in his work.
					
					The action taken by the group of traitors against Ro for paying a visit to Pyongyang to honor the memory of leader Kim Jong Il is touching off bitter resentment among all Koreans.

articles.title: Russians Condemn UNSC for Violating Sovereignty of DPRK
articles.content:
Russians Condemn UNSC for Violating Sovereignty of DPRK
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Russian personages demanded the immediate withdrawal of the UN Security Council's "resolution" that encroaches on the sovereignty of the DPRK and bans its right to launch satellite for peaceful purposes.
					The chairman of the War Veterans Committee in Moscow said in a statement on Jan. 26:
					
					It is the legitimate right of the DPRK, a sovereign state, to launch a satellite.
					
					The U.S. and its followers cooked up the UNSC's "resolution" in a bid to deter the DPRK from building an economic giant.
					
					The U.S. moves to deprive the DPRK of its independent right not only run counter to the aspiration and desire of the Korean people and the peace-loving progressives but also wantonly violate international law.
					
					Viktor Yegorov, chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia, said in a statement on Jan. 29 the UNSC infringed upon the sovereignty of the DPRK, following the U.S. hostile policy towards it.
					
					The DPRK's satellite launch is the exercise of the legitimate right of a sovereign state as it does not fall foul of international law, he said.
					
					He demanded the UNSC apologize to the DPRK for infringing upon its sovereignty, being subservient to the U.S., and cancel the "resolution" against it.

articles.title: UN "Resolution" Denounced in Russia, Belarus
articles.content:
UN "Resolution" Denounced in Russia, Belarus
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Public organizations of Russia and Belarus published statements on Jan. 28 and 29 in denunciation of the unwarranted UN Security Council's "resolution" against the DPRK.
					The National Salvation Front of Russia said:
					
					The DPRK successfully launched satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 on Dec. 12 in 2012. This was a historic event that demonstrated the big progress made by socialist Korea in science and technology and its emergence as a power with the capacity to carry out its own space program.
					
					The U.S. policy for stifling the DPRK by force of arms met a total collapse.
					
					The UNSC's "resolution" against socialist Korea is unreasonable.
					
					What is more disgraceful is that other permanent member states of the UNSC agreed to the "resolution" proposed by the U.S.
					
					This proves that they blindly follow the U.S.
					
					It is quite just that the DPRK totally rejected the UNSC's "resolutions" that violate its sovereignty. 
					
					The Social Association "For Democracy, Social Progress and Justice" of Belarus denounced the UNSC's "resolution" for disturbing the peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the region.
					
					It expressed belief that the Korean people would surely win a victory in their efforts for defending the sovereignty of the country and nation under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Kuwait
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Kuwait
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A Kuwaiti preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated on February 3.
					Yousef Al Amiri, president of the Kuwait House of Works who doubles as chairman of the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					It decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the exploits of Kim Jong Il, release a statement and introduce them through website from Feb. 3 to 16.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Egypt
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Egypt
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- An Egyptian preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated on February 3.
					According to a decision of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt on the formation of the preparatory committee, Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, member of the Highest Body of the Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The decision called for organizing diverse political and cultural events including a seminar on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Organizations of Bulgaria, Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Organizations of Bulgaria, Bangladesh
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Bulgarian and Bangladeshi public organizations issued bulletins on Jan. 31 and Feb. 1 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association carried a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il with some articles including "February 16 is the Day of Shining Star".
					
					The bulletin praised him as the great leader of Koreans who devoted his all to the freedom and happiness of the people and victory of the socialist cause. It elaborated on his undying exploits for the human cause of independence.
					
					The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee carried an article titled "Eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea", which said that though he passed away, the WPK upholds him as the eternal general secretary and regards his idea and line as its guidelines.
					
					The WPK and the Korean people are regarding his idea and theories as the immutable truth in their general advance for building a thriving socialist country.
					
					His Songun politics helped the DPRK hold the position of a military power.
					
					It is thanks to his wise leadership that the DPRK is demonstrating its dignity and might as a satellite manufacturing and launching state as well as a nuclear weapons state.
					
					He will always be with the ever-victorious WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Bangladeshi Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Bangladeshi Personages
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, and Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, released a joint statement on February 2 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					They said:
					
					HE Kim Jong Il comprehensively developed in depth the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and firmly defended socialism from the imperialists' moves to invade and stifle the DPRK by pursuing the Songun politics.
					
					The Songun politics serves as a banner for winning victory after victory as it makes it possible to defend the sovereignty of the country and nation from the daily intensifying moves of the imperialists.
					
					The Songun politics instills strong faith and courage into the world progressives in their struggle for building a new society.
					
					We are firmly convinced that the army and people of the DPRK will achieve greater successes in building a thriving nation and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the Songun leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Websites of Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Websites of Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A Swiss preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) posted the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" on websites of the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on February 3.
					The work, made public on September 5, Juche 97 (2008), clarifies in detail that the invincible might of the DPRK lies in upholding and preserving President Kim Il Sung's idea of Juche-oriented nation-building and his feats and eternally glorifying them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Figure of Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Highly Praised by Figure of Kyrgyzstan
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party who doubles as chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan, released a statement on February 1 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Kim Jong Il was an outstanding statesman and the greatest man who devoted himself not only to the Korean revolution but to the accomplishment of the human cause of independence for a long period, the statement said, and went on:
					
					He enforced the unique Songun politics when the imperialist allied forces were talking about the "end of socialism" in the 1990s, firmly defending the sovereignty of the DPRK and instilling faith in the victory of socialism into progressive people.
					
					The DPRK successfully launched satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 manufactured entirely by its own efforts and with indigenous technology in December last year under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. This marked a significant occasion which once again demonstrated the overall national power of the DPRK.
					
					The imperialist allied forces are running amuck to stifle the DPRK with its satellite launch for peaceful purposes as an occasion. But the Korean people will achieve greater successes in the struggle for defending socialism, building an economic giant and reunifying the country, single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Foreign Newspapers Praise Kim Jong Il's Exploits
articles.content:
Foreign Newspapers Praise Kim Jong Il's Exploits
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers devoted special write-ups to the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The Bangladeshi newspaper Daily Fork on February 2 allotted its four pages to articles titled "Under the banner of Songun" and "Songun Korea" illustrated with photos of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un on their revolutionary activities.
					
					The paper in an article titled "Songun brilliant commander" said that Kim Jong Il was a peerlessly brilliant Songun commander possessed of rare military strategy and matchless pluck. It went on:
					
					He firmly defended socialism, holding high the banner of Songun despite the collapse of the socialist countries in Eastern European, offensive of the imperialist allied forces against socialism and severe natural calamities.
					
					The DPRK winning victory after victory under the uplifted banner of Songun has greatly inspired the anti-imperialist and independent countries and peoples in the world and given strong spurs to the cause of global independence.
					
					The Iranian newspaper Iran News on February 3 devoted a whole page to a special write-up titled "The great leader Kim Jong Il always lives in the hearts of the people" accompanied with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					The paper in an article titled "Career of a great man recorded in history" noted that the career of Kim Jong Il was the most brilliant one of a great revolutionary who explored the road of hard struggle with his iron will and superhuman energy, holding aloft the red flag, and a noble one of the peerless patriot who dedicated himself to the country and its people.
					
					The Nepali newspaper Charcha on February 4 carried an article praising the personality of Kim Jong Un as a great man illustrated with his photo.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae recorre campo de construccion de Piscina de Munsu
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae recorre campo de construccion de Piscina de Munsu
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ACNC) -- El jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, recorrio el campo de construccion de la Piscina de Munsu en la zona de igual nombre de esta capital, que incumbe al EPC.
					Choe estimulo primero a los constructores militares que producen innovaciones en la construccion en acato al legado del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il y la orden del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Durante su recorrido por varios puntos del campo, subrayo que la mision del ejercito revolucionario del partido, el revolucionario esta en materializar cabalmente la orden del Comandante Supremo y tomolas medidas tras averiguar de modo detallado los problemas que se presentan en la construccion.
					
					Encomendo a los oficiales atender bien las condiciones de vida de los soldados. 
					
					Puntualizo que todos los constructores deben mostrar sin reserva el temperamento de ejercito revolucionario en la obra para poner en practica el proyecto del Comandante Supremo para el pueblo.

articles.title: IRP enumera 10 crimenes antinacionales y anti-reunificacion de banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
IRP enumera 10 crimenes antinacionales y anti-reunificacion de banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria (IRP) hizo publica este sabado una nota de los 10 crimenes antinacionales y anti-reunificacion cometidos por la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak que llevo a la fase catastrofica las relaciones Norte-Sur de Corea mediante su campana de confrontacion fratricida y de guerra contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Segun el texto, 10 crimenes son los siguientes: la difamacion de la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, la violacion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur, la campana nuclear y de misiles contra la RPDC, la campana de DDHH contra ella, el enfrentamiento de regimenes en detrimento de la reunificacion, la ruptura del dialogo Norte-Sur, la suspension de la cooperacion e intercambio N-S, la represion sobre el movimiento por la reunificacion, el belicismo contra la RPDC, la traicion y servilismo a grandes potencias. 
					
					Durante 5 anos de su mandato, la banda de Lee cometio el nunca perdonable crimen de calumniar atrevidamente la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, provocando gran indignacion del ejercito y pueblo de ella, comienza el documento y prosigue: 
					
					Se burlo de las lagrimas de sangre derramadas por los coreanos entristecidos por el gran duelo nacional e impidio en todo lo posible los actos y las visitas de condolencias de los habitantes surcoreanos y otros nacionales.
					
					No vacilo hasta en disparar tomando por blanco la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y colocar consignas y otros materiales de propaganda que la insultaban. 
					
					Impidio la implementacion de las declaraciones intercoreanas negandolas y describiendolas como "documentos procomunistas y proenemigos"
					
					Echo por tierra todos los exitos alcanzados en la era del 15 de Junio calificandola de "un decenio perdido", reprimio a los partidarios de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y llevaron a la muerte a los dos "presidentes" antecesores que firmaron las declaraciones aprobadas entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					Durante su mandato, la horda de Lee recurrio obstinadamente a la campana nuclear y de misiles contra la RPDC amparando y siguiendo a su amo EE.UU. que causo el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y se enfrasca en desatar la guerra nuclear contra la parte connacional. 
					
					Cuando la RPDC declaro las medidas intransigentes rechazando la injusta "resolucion de sancion" de la ONU que viola flagrantemente la soberania y la dignidad de ella, la camarilla de Lee comenzo a portarse como perro rabioso hablando de la "provocacion adicional", "sancion fuerte" y "cooperacion internacional" 
					
					Trata de fabricar en la "Asamblea Nacional" la "ley de DDHH del Norte" orquestando la farsa de publicacion de la "carta blanca de DDHH del Norte".
					
					Envia a una chusma a varios paises para internacionalizar el "problema de DDHH del Norte". 
					
					Por otra parte, cometio el secuestro y el rapto de los norcoreanos y los atentados terroristas y de sabotaje en el interior de la RPDC.
					
					El connotado caso de la "sociedad para destruir las estatuas de bronce" demuestra a que grado llega la campana intrigante anti-RPDC de los traidores surcoreanos. 
					
					La banda de Lee presento como meta final de su "politica sobre el Norte" la "unificacion bajo el sistema democratico liberal".
					
					Expuso publicamente su ambicion de enfrentar los regimenes del Norte y el Sur hablando del supuesto "cambio" y "apertura" y desafio frontalmente al regimen norcoreano diciendo que "no se puede convivir con el Norte", "no se debe considerar el Norte como parte connacional" y "hay que dar tratos diferentes al poder del Norte y a sus habitantes".
					
					En el lustro de mandato de Lee, no se ha realizado debidamente ni una sola vez el dialogo entre las autoridades de ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					La camarilla surcoreana interrumpio la cooperacion y el intercambio Norte-Sur diciendo que "no podemos hacer la cooperacion economica mientras existen armas nucleares en el Norte" y que "la cooperacion no puede mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas". E impidio la cooperacion y el intercambio de nivel civil bajo el pretexto de que de las empresas y entidades surcoreanas vinculadas deben asegurar la "transparencia". 
					
					Por otra parte, en virtud de las infames leyes fascistas, penalizo a las entidades y personalidades pro-reunificacion tildandoles de "fuerzas pro-Norte", "elementos procomunistas" y "espias". 
					
					Debido a la violencia fascista de la banda traidora contra las entidades del movimiento por la reunificacion, la sociedad surcoreana de hoy hace recordar la era oscura de la dictadura de "renovacion" en que resultaban arrestados solo por haber dicho la palabra "reunificacion". 
					
					Durante el mandato de Lee, se libraron en mas de 180 ocasiones los ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea como "Key Resolve", "Foal Eagle" y "Ulji Freedom Guardian" y en mil y cientos de ocasiones, los independientes del ejercito surcoreano. 
					
					Tan pronto como tomara el poder, el traidor Lee preconizo "dar prioridad a las relaciones" con EE.UU. insultando el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales". 
					
					Hizo vista gorda de los crimenes del pasado de Japon y fomento la ambicion de este pais isleno de convertirse en potencia militar, lanzar la nueva agresion y arrebatar territorios ajenos. 
					
					Ahora los compinches de Lee estan desesperados para que prosiga en el proximo "poder" su politica conflictiva de caracter antinacional y anti-reunificacion. 
					
					Ha sido siempre tragico el fin de los anteriores maniacos de confrontacion que rehusaban la reunificacion. 
					
					La banda de Lee correra un destino mas tragico que ellos por sus inauditos crimenes de traicion cometidos contra la nacion.

articles.title: ACNC critica "Acuerdo Administrativo" EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC critica "Acuerdo Administrativo" EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ACNC) -- Desde cuando entro en vigor el 9 de febrero del 1967 el "Acuerdo Administrativo" Estados Unidos-Sur de Corea firmado el 9 de julio de 1966, genero solo la legalizacion del crimen de las tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en el territorio  surcoreano.
					El acuerdo estipula que el Sur de Corea no puede castigar a cualquier uniformado estadounidense que cometa crimen en medio de la ejecucion de funciones oficiales, debido a lo cual se declaro inculpabilidad a quienes que el dia 13 de junio de 2002 atropellaron con carro blindado a Sin Hyo Sun y Sim Mi Son, alumnas de la escuela secundaria.
					
					En la comuna de Maehyang y otros lugares numerosos habitantes surcoreanos murieron y quedaron heridos debido a los ejercicios de guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea, pero, hasta la fecha, no recibieron ni la indemnizacion ni disculpa por parte norteamericana.
					
					A pesar de que asesinaron a Yun Kum I, Ho Ju Yon, Jon Ji Na, Ri Ki Sun y otras mujeres surcoreanas, los delincuentes norteamericanos  evadieron la condena a pena capital y pasan libremente en virtud del citado acuerdo.
					
					Durante el periodo del mandato de Lee Myung Bak, las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea gozando del trato preferente del "Acuerdo" cometieron por doquier los crimenes de toda indole.
					
					En la provincia de Kyonggi, los yanquis borrachos mataron a sablazos y a palazos a los habitantes, robaron el telefono portatil de los conyuges setentones tras violarla con armas. En una palabra cometieron un sinnumero de   crimenes incluyendo el incendio, el narcotrafico, la violacion sexual y el pillaje.
					
					Los soldados de la base aerea norteamericana en Osan violaron en varias ocasiones a los habitantes surcoreanos tras esposarlos sin fundamento alguno.
					
					Sin embargo, la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak  amparo a ciegas los crimenes de  ellos.
					
					Desde el 2010 hasta agosto del ano pasado, en la provincia de Kyonggi llego a mas de 300 el numero de crimenes terribles y narcotraficos. Pero, el policia declaro inculpabilidad todos los casos menos un caso, lo que revela la naturaleza humillante de la banda de traidores.
					
					Todos los hechos demuestran fehacientemente que mientras siga la ocupacion del imperialismo norteamericano del Sur de Corea y la banda de traidores como Lee tome el poder, continuaran legalmente los crimenes de los ocupantes.

articles.title: "Sancion" anti-RPDC buscara solo la guerra, subraya Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
"Sancion" anti-RPDC buscara solo la guerra, subraya Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que las relaciones intercoreanas y la Peninsula Coreana viven nuevamente la tensa situacion debido a las hostilidades anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de Estados Unidos y sus satelites que fabricaron la "resolucion de sancion" en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU cuestionando el legitimo lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos, y continua:
					La banda traidora surcoreana de Lee Myung Bak, habituada a vetar a la connacional RPDC, se inclina a ejecutar activamente la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC y lleva la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a la fase extremadamente tensa realizando los ejercicios de guerra con EE.UU.
					
					La campana de "sancion" anti-RPDC es una hostilidad para suprimir la dignidad y la soberania de ella.
					
					La "sancion" implica la guerra porque es un medio para la invasion al Norte de Corea.
					
					Las agresiones de EE.UU. contra los paises antiyanquis e independientes se cometen por este orden: la "sancion mediante la ONU", la "sancion independiente" y el "ataque militar". El imperio trata de aplicar esta formula tambien contra la RPDC.
					
					Ahora, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos intentan aprobar la resolucion de "sancion adicional" inmediatamente despues de que se reportara la supuesta "provocacion adicional del Norte (de Corea)" e incluir en ella el articulo 42 del capitulo 7 de la Carta de la ONU referente a la "sancion" militar. De tolerarse eso, se desatara finalmente en la Peninsula Coreana la guerra nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					La RPDC esta preparada tanto para la "sancion" economica como para la "militar".
					
					Los que atentan contra la dignidad y la soberania de ella no podra evitar el implacable castigo de venganza.
